Production Co: Touchstone Pictures, Sonnenfeld Josephson Worldwide Ent., George Litto Pictures
Sound Mix: Surround, Dolby SR, Dolby Digital, DTS, SDDS
Synopsis: Four fossilized former wiseguys -- Bobby Bartellemeo (Richard Dreyfuss), Joey "Bats" Pistella (Burt Reynolds), Mike "The Brick" Donatelli (Dan Hedaya), and Tony "Mouth" Donato (Seymour Cassel) -- face eviction from the semi-squalor of the Raj Mahal home on an otherwise posh strip of shore. The crew hatches a seemingly simple scheme to save their retirement residence.
Title: The Crew
